body:
I tried the .zip just now on a 2nd machine, and I could not reproduce. I then installed the MSI https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.6beta2.windows-amd64.msi on the same machine and the error does reproduce.

So it looks like the error is in the MSI, but not in the zip.

Most of the timestamps in the .zip and the .msi differ by about 2 seconds, so a naive "diff -u" on the directory listings isn't helpful.

While both installs preserve the timestamp of files, it may be interesting to note that while the .zip preserves the timestamp on directories, the .msi does not.
